Thank you for downloading Camera Shake! 
To install Camera Shake, go to Window > Camera Shake > Install Camera Shake. To get started, go to Window > Camera Shake > Welcome.

The reference manual for this version can be found by going to Window > Camera Shake > Reference Manual. This manual can also be downloaded locally by going to the Camera Shake preference pane in the Unity preferences.

The up-to-date reference manual is available at:
https://docs.thinksquirrel.com/camera-shake/reference/

Product support can be found at:
https://support.thinksquirrel.com

For information on other Thinksquirrel extensions, check out:
https://www.thinksquirrel.com
